data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 962,792 believers in Adamawa against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Adamawa, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Adamawa. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help the 962,792 believers in Adamawa to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 2,774,407 lost friends and neighbors.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Adamawa. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Adamawa unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Adamawa, Nigeria not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Adamawa, Nigeria has a population of 3,737,200.

We estimate Adamawa has 962,792 people who might know Jesus, 951,020 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,823,387 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Adamawa.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
